entry.title: Create realistic test data for your web app
entry.id: Create realistic test data for your web app
entry.summary: In this post we're going to explore how we can solve the problem of test data generation using our open-source project, Synth! Synth is a state-of-the-art declarative data generator - you tell Synth what you want your data to look like and Synth will generate that data for you.
